attributes.action: Dartmoor pony meat for human consumption
attributes.additional_details:
South West Equine Protection want the government to take a stand and enforce removal of stallions or vasectomising stallions grazing on Dartmoor Commons to reduce the numbers of ponies running on the commons.
Continuing to overbred ponies to go to the human food chain is not solving the problem but encouraging over breeding and poor quality ponies.
Stop overbreeding ponies and remove stallions.
